lead_paragraph: A high school football coach in suburban Philadelphia has resigned amid accusations that three senior football players sexually assaulted a freshman on what the team called “No Gay Thursday.”
snippet: A high school football coach in suburban Philadelphia has resigned amid accusations that three senior football players sexually assaulted a freshman on what the team called “No Gay Thursday.”
abstract: John Vogan, football coach at Conestoga High School near Philadelphia, resigns amid investigation of three senior players who allegedly sexually assaulted freshman teammate in hazing ritual known as 'No Gay Thursday'.
